title_desc: Vista Rooms builds on a rare blend of innovation and technology, infused by the like minded entrepreneurs , who possess ...See moreVista Rooms builds on a rare blend of innovation and technology, infused by the like minded entrepreneurs , who possess a unique mix of creative intuition and management skills from their diverse backgrounds in IT, Recruitment, Education and Hospitality. Saturated with their daily job routines and with a quest of doing something passionate in the hospitality space, the trio team united around a mission: to change the stay experience of travellers while they are away from home.
